official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to apply certain aviation safety standards to public aircraft which are leased by government agencies, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to revise the definition of "public aircraft" to mean any aircraft owned and operated by any State, territorial, or local government. (Currently, such term means any aircraft used exclusively in the service of such a government.)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to apply certain aviation safety standards to public aircraft which are leased by government agencies, and for other purposes.
